D

dailyTask() - Method in class Server.EchoServer
Performs a daily task related which is sending email to who orders in order to check if they're coming.
Databaseedit - Class in Server
The Databaseedit class provides methods for connecting to a MySQL database, executing SQL queries, and handling database operations related to the GoNature application.
Databaseedit() - Constructor for class Server.Databaseedit
 
DEFAULT_PORT - Static variable in class Server.EchoServer
The default port to listen on.
DEFAULT_PORT - Static variable in class Server.ServerUI
The default port number for the server.
DELETE_ORDER - GoNature.Options.Option
 
DELETE_REQUEST - GoNature.Options.Option
 
deleteOrder(Order) - Static method in class Server.Databaseedit
Deletes an order from the database and inserts it into the 'canceledorders' table.
deleteRequest(Request) - Static method in class Server.Databaseedit
Deletes a request from the database.
deleteunplannedOrder(int) - Static method in class Server.Databaseedit
Deletes an unplanned order based on the provided order ID.
DENY_GUIDE - GoNature.Options.Option
 
denyGuide(String) - Static method in class Server.Databaseedit
Denies a guide request by removing it from the database.
